name: @said.ouarrich/hsl-to-hex
description: Convert HSL colors to RGB colors in hex format. ## Install ```sh npm install --save @davidmarkclements/hsl-to-hex ``` ## API ``` require('hsl-to-hex') => Function hsl(hue, saturation, luminosity)` => String ``` ## Example ```js var hsl = require('hsl-to-hex') var hue = 133 var saturation = 40 var luminosity = 60 var hex = hsl(hue, saturation, luminosity) console.log(hex) // #70c282 ``` ## License ISC
author: Said OUARRICH
